SELECT votes.id,votes.title,votes.creator_id,votes.start_time,votes.end_time,type,votes.max,mobile,participator_num,votes.updated_at,visibility_limit FROM votes,users WHERE votes.is_deleted = FALSE AND votes.creator_id = users.id ORDER BY votes.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO votes (title, description, anonymous, participator_limit, visibility_limit, start_time, end_time, creator_id, created_at, updated_at, password,type,max) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{anonymous}, #{participatorLimit}, #{visibilityLimit}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{creatorId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{password},#{type},#{max});
INSERT INTO project (name_zh, name_eg, stu_id, stu_name, hold, create_at) VALUES (#{name_zh},#{name_eg},#{stu_id},#{stu_name},#{hold},#{create_at})
INSERT INTO activity (title, start_time, end_time, visibility) VALUES (#{title},#{start_time},#{end_time},#{visibility})
mapper.update: UPDATE votes SET is_deleted = TRUE, visibility_limit = FALSE WHERE id = #{id}
